Question: This person: Cultural Learnings of America for Make Benefit Glorious Nation of Kazakhstan was well received by critics.
Hints: In New York, this person sees an episode of Baywatch on television and immediately falls in love with Pamela Anderson.
Sacha Baron Cohen arrived in character as this person in a cart pulled by women dressed as peasants.
Staying at a bed-and-breakfast, this person and his producer are stunned to learn their hosts are Jewish.
